fields.name: start
fields.description: Start - when this component appears, in s relative to beginning

fields.name: duration
fields.description: Duration - how long this sprite appears, in s

fields.name: x
fields.description: Appear x - x-coord the sprite's center appears at relative to the center of the enemy battle portrait

fields.name: y
fields.description: Appear y - y-coord the sprite's center appears at relative to the center of the enemy battle portrait

fields.name: rotation
fields.description: Rotation type - enable if the result of rotation is good-looking and distinct
